definition: a slip/miscalculation/unwise move/accidentally/by mistake/to lose control/to be defeated
to lose/to miss/to fail
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]
lit. just as humans make mistakes, so can a horse stumble (idiom)/fig. everyone makes mistakes/even the best fall down sometimes
pinyin: ren2 you3 shi1 shou3 , ma3 you3 shi1 ti2

sentences.english: Do you employ risk reduction techniques without fail?
sentences.chinese: 你是否使用風險降低技巧並從沒失手？

sentences.english: That’s why Howell was never caught.
sentences.chinese: 這就是豪厄爾從未失手的原因。

sentences.english: So there I was happily pan frying the slabs when I lost my grip on one as I was turning it.
sentences.chinese: 我高興地用煎鍋煎魚片，在翻轉魚片時我失手了。

sentences.english: Finally a single missed on the 1st, died under Luanqiang.
sentences.chinese: 最後一單1號失手，死於亂槍之下。

sentences.english: Be more careful not to miss once than to hit a hundred times.
sentences.chinese: 多加小心，避免萬一失手勝過百發百中。

sentences.english: She dropped the plate and smashed it.
sentences.chinese: 她失手把盤子掉在地上打碎了。

sentences.english: When I was pouring the tea, I dropped a cup.
sentences.chinese: 我在倒茶的時候，失手打了一個茶杯。

sentences.english: The pedagogue can't definitely deliberately lose again this period.
sentences.chinese: 這一次師父一定不會再失手。

sentences.english: But sometimes the magic doesn’t work.
sentences.chinese: 但是，魔術有時候也會失手。

sentences.english: Capture the heart on the A Longnu of evil on the spot, the face about after accidentally drop kills adulterer leaves.
sentences.chinese: 當場捉姦的阿龍怒上心頭，失手殺死姦夫後轉身離去。

sentences.english: I dropped the plate and it smashed.
sentences.chinese: 我失手將盤子掉在地上摔碎了。

sentences.english: Just waiting in punishing Joe buck ojeda flood drowned when miss him.
sentences.chinese: 恰巴克等人在懲罰託赫達洪的時候失手淹死了他。

sentences.english: Roderigo. Be near at hand; I may miscarry in't.
sentences.chinese: 羅德利哥不要走開，也許我會失手。

sentences.english: Now there is a panic about losing Australia to the Far East.
sentences.chinese: 現在卻爲將失手澳大利亞於這個遠東國家而恐慌。

sentences.english: He dropped the knife and it clattered on the stone floor.
sentences.chinese: 他一失手，刀子噹啷一聲掉到石頭地面上。

sentences.english: Montero is in love with Don Diego's wife, who is accidentally killed.
sentences.chinese: 蒙特羅也愛着迭戈的妻子，但他的手下失手殺死了她。

definition: to lose one's footing/to slip/to take a wrong step in life
to lose one's life
to fall to one's death
to mistakenly kill/manslaughter
lit. the horse loses its front hooves/fig. sudden failure through miscalculation or inattentiveness
to injure accidentally/accidental injury
to fall down/to slip and fall/to throw sb to the ground
homicide (law)
to die/to perish
homicide/to murder/to kill (a person)
to throw down/to fall/to drop and break
to meet with unexpected failure (idiom)/to fail miserably (where failure was not expected)
to lose one's life/to get killed
to have an accident/to meet with a mishap
to kill/to beat to death
to overturn/to overthrow/to strike down (an enemy)
